```{r pancreas 32720049, include=FALSE}

PMID_32720049 <- RefManageR::ReadPubMed('32720049', database = 'PubMed')

citation_32720049 <- paste0(PMID_32720049$journal,' ', PMID_32720049$year, ' ', PMID_32720049$month,';', PMID_32720049$volume,'(', PMID_32720049$number,'):', PMID_32720049$pages)

PubMed_32720049 <- paste0(PubMedString, PMID_32720049$eprint)

doi_32720049 <- paste0(doiString, PMID_32720049$doi)

Sys.sleep(1)

```
